name: Cyrus the Great
what_did:
Cyrus united the Persian tribes and built one of the largest empires in history.
He was known for respecting other cultures and letting people keep their own religions.
He freed the Jewish people from captivity in Babylon.
why_matters:
Cyrus showed that rulers could be powerful and kind.
He started a model of leadership based on fairness and respect.
His empire helped connect different peoples across Asia.
